archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Correlate Service Alarm Event Notifications
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process encompasses the correlation of redundant, transient or implied service alarm event notifications with a specific â€œroot causeâ€� service alarm event notification and associated service alarm event record. This process correlates service alarm event notifications to planned outage notifications to remove false service alarm event notifications arising as a result of the planned outage activity.

properties.value: Not used for this process element
